snippet.title: Candied Root Vegetables
snippet.description: Roasting brings out the natural sweetness of vegetables. No sugar is needed in this delicious and easy recipe.

snippet.title: Spring Pasta with Radishes and Peas
snippet.description: A delicious and utterly unique pasta, this dish is springtime in a bowl. Try Catherine Newman's easy, elegant recipe today.

snippet.title: Root Vegetable Gratin
snippet.description: The rich flavor of Gruy√®re cheese brings out the nutty flavor of the roots in this creamy gratin. Any combination of roots works in this recipe, but if you use red beets, they will streak the gratin with bright color.

snippet.title: Roast Chicken and Roots
snippet.description: Root vegetables are abundant in fall and winter, but they can be a little daunting: grubby and odd, and what on earth do you do with them? But roasting concentrates their sweetness, making them a natural for kids, even ...

snippet.title: Four Seasons of Produce
snippet.description: Download our printable produce guide to learn what fruits and veggies are best to buy in which season, and which produce is great right from the grocer's freezer.

snippet.title: Television Review: Lewis Black's Root of All Evil
snippet.description: Funny, but verges on meanness; for mature viewers.

snippet.title: Digging for the Roots of the Family Tree
Video Game Review: Death Jr.: Root of Evil
snippet.description: Delightful romp with a not-so-grim reaper.
